author: Eleanor Doughty
title: The best anti-ageing gadgets to try out now
text: Now then - the anti-ageing gadget . Don't pull that cynical face, it's worth considering. You might be really unsure about the idea of a machine that purports to reverse, or slow down, the anti-ageing process, but really - these things work! Granted, they have different effects for different people, but these are the best little anti-ageing gadgets on the market and frankly, you'd be mad not to try them out. You can play with them at your heart's content - not from a salon in the middle of town, but from your own bathroom, and really, in the business of anti-ageing, a little comfort goes a long way. 1. Slendertone Photo: Slendertone You've probably heard of Slendertone - they do all sorts of brilliant toning products, but this one is for your face. It might look a bit like a curious Bluetooth headset, but the electronic muiscle stimulation (EMS) gives a signal to facial nerves to activate muscles. This firms them up, and you should notice a difference after 14 days. With 99 intensity levels, you can go at your own pace with this face massage and toning gizmo to achieve younger looking skin. £129.99, slendertone.com 2. Tria Photo: Tria Tria's age-defying laser is a real Inspector Gadget gadget, clinically proven to treat multiple signs of ageing. The laser technology stimulates the renewal of collagen and activation of new cells, reducing pigmentation in your face, improving the skin's texture and smoothing naughty wrinkles. Best of all, this can all be done from the comfort of your own home. £450, selfridges.com 3. HoMedics Photo: NEWA HoMedics' Newa is proven to be able to reactivate your skin's ability to produce collagen, which is a pretty bold claim - and one you're going to need to get on board with. This natty tool delivers energy into the skin, reactivating the collagen process in a way that cells, fillers and chemicals are simply unable to achieve. After your first treatment you'll be noticeably glowing, and after four weeks, you'll see a reduce in fine lines and wrinkles. Just the ticket! £199, boots.com 4. Love My Skin Photo: Love My Skin The Love My Skin anti-ageing pen uses Red Light Therapy to stimulate the production of collagen, the protein you always hear about. Containing six LEDs, they operate to smooth, plump and firm skin - if used for one minutes, three times a day, within four weeks, your skin will look noticably smoother. £40, boots.com Read more • The very best day creams • Our favourite night creams • Anti-ageing top tips: pick up some SPF • The best anti-ageing hand creams @telegoodlife
